name: Mesonoxian
summary: Mesonoxian is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Tyran. Tyran is stuck inside his home due to a rainstorm, leaving him to daydream in his free time. The main goal is to explore and collect effects (known as Influences). A minigame can be played on the console in the room outside the bedroom.
